website_summaries.verdict: If you go to the beach, hike through water, or do water aerobics on a regular basis and are looking for a shoe you can wear all day, this is your best choice.
pros: These lightweight shoes are true to size and dry very quickly
They're supportive enough as well that many buyers use them as a water/athletic shoe combo
cons: The laces are only decorative and don't tighten the shoe
They're also a little pricier than other brands

customer_reviews.title: No free refund from this vendor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! bought the item in part because it offered free returns, just in case.... you want shoes to fit! Well, they are running somewhat large, so they were very loose on my foot, which you don't want in watershoes. Returned the item immediately and just realized that I was charged $6.00 for shipping... They deducted $6.00 from my refund - not cool!! Very, very disappointed and feeling misled.
customer_reviews.author: rudymama

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Just got these delivered today, and wow! I’m very pleased with my purchase. The shoes are very stylish, lightweight, and most importantly comfortable! I’m a 6.5, but I bought a 7 (which were a tiny bit big at the toe) because my feet swell in the heat, I plane to hike in these and swim. The material is soft, I dont foresee getting any blisters in these. I have wide feet, the width was not an issue. The part around the ankle is soft neoprene. I just hope they last a few hikes in rocky Hawaii. Worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8 to 81/2. I purchased an 8 1/2 and I just love these water shoes. I wear them all the time and prefer instead of sneakers...LOL I like have an extra pair that I use when I am in and out of the house working on the inside or outside planting. Helps me feel safe when floor is wet. After making it through summer, these shoes have held up and I am going to buy another pair. Very comfortable and use lots of times when working in yard and going in and out house. I feel safe when going from water outside to walking on tile inside.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I assumed these were real athletic shoes but to my surprise they turned out to be made from the cheapest materials I've ever seen in shoes. The glue was slopped all around the upper material from the soles. The extremely thin upper shoe couldn't keep your feet warm in colder weather so I could only wear them in summer. There's no support for your feet & would actually in my opinion they would be bad for your feet if you're standing up for very long . These may have been worth about $8.00 at the most. Returning would cost more than they're worth.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Rocks stuck underneath shoe. Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to double as water shoes and hiking shoes. They took about a a whole day to dry after going to the beach so that was inconvenient. Also when walking you can feel everything that's on the ground so it was uncomfortable, also they get rocks stuck underneath them so you have to pry them out because it was uncomfortable to walk. Overall not worth the money, they look cute but I could've gone a couple more dollars and gotten a name brand shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual shoe size. They stay on my feet when in the water, although they feel a bit loose when walking on the pool deck. The" laces" are elastic and when wearing them the tongue of each shoe slides to the side, though that doesn't change anything except the cosmetics of the shoe. I wear these in the pool 2 days a week and have had them for one month. On the bottom of one of the shoes one black insert at the forefoot is peeling away. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great, even for my neuropathy! Comfortable for all day!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes! I bought them for a cruise. I wore them most of the time. So comfortable and light weight. I have neuropathy in my feet terribly. I worried about how these would feel. They have some arch support which was so important for me! I LOVE them! We walked alot and they were perfect. I also wore them deep sea fishing. Good soles good grip and the water doesn't get stuck in them at all. I highly recommend. They fit perfectly! My husband got a pair of men's and he usually hates water shoes. But he loved them too.
customer_reviews.author: eatgoat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE overview!
customer_reviews.text: So many good things to say about these shoes! I will update after a while of wearing them daily. But when if they wear, I will still continue to buy them because they are my new favorite shoe. As long as I can wash them in the washer I will be happy forever so we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Reneè Seipp

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a trip
customer_reviews.text: just came back from my trip and these were great! i went on an excursion where i rode atv's, went swimming, back on the atv's, did some light hiking, and i have not one complaint. they also look like nike's which made me happy instead of having to wear dorky water shoes. Bottom line: - dry quick/easy to clean - great for more than just water - fashionable - no rocks/pebbles got inside the shoe - light
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving a 5 star review for now, I'll update after I wear them in the water this weekend. I read through the reviews to decided what size to order. In Nike shoes I typically wear an 8 or 8.5 depending on style. People commented these ran big, so I went with the 8 and they fit perfectly. They felt comfortable(they weren't too tight or stiff) material was nice, and overall a nice quality. I don't imagine you'd want to wear these on an extensive hike because they are just a water shoe. I'll update after this weekend how they held up in the water, how quickly they dried, and whether they were slick on Creek rock.
customer_reviews.author: breilly

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading other positive reviews. I've been looking for easy, no shoe lace, throw on shoes that aren't just canvas shoes (TOMS, chucks, VANS, Perry, etc.) and these fit the bill! I have wide feet and these fit so well. Despite these being water shoes, I wear them to run errands and keep up with my kids. I did, however, get them wet walking through wet grass and they dried within 2 hours after I took them off at home. They're awesome and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor adventure
customer_reviews.text: I got these for our vacation to Cancun. I knew we planned on booking an adventurous excursion and wanted something that would have traction and be great in the water! These were perfect! We rappeled, climbed ropes, ziplined and swam in cenotes- they never hurt my feet or felt uncomfortable. I was so glad to have had shoes on to swim in. On the other hand they were not so great for a pick up game of tennis. Practically ripped the skin off my pinky toe. But that will not be my go to shoe for sports. Hiking and a swim. Yes!
customer_reviews.author: knothdurft19

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I get hot feet sometimes and when I am working these help to keep my feet cool!! In the summer regular sneakers just make my feet burn up even when I am not wearing socks. These have been so much better for my hot feet. There was one day I was getting out of my car and stepped into a water puddle. Freaked me out at first because I forgot that I had on "water shoes". LOL. These can't be worn when it is raining outside, but still love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great look and super comfortable. Perfect for every day
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great look and super comfortable. Even perfect for every day. I originally bought those for upcoming Mexico trip but after I tried them I haven’t stoped wearing them. I use them when going for a walk, walking my dog, gardening and every day use. No one even can’t tell the difference b/w those water shoes and regular snickers. I get lots of compliments on them. Shipping was very fast and I was pleasantly surprise to discovere that the quality of the shoe is great. I usually wear size 7 but order size 7.5 as suggested. I will definitely order another pair but probably will go with size 7 next time.
customer_reviews.author: Petya Esho

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Iriginal shies, different seller/distributor/maker... These are cute. They are comfortable. I have worn them in and out of the water for over two years and the sole is just starting to show signs of wear. I love that they run slightly larger and have a good toe box. I bought a backpack in the same color and they are my summer go tos! Additional note: these shoes bought a few weeks ago lwave a dark pink dye sta;, Additional note: The only thing I didn't like was lack of arch support ... when I ordered 2 more pairs I went down a half size. Increased comfort and arch support! Same good toe box. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Joyce N.

customer_reviews.title: Works for tender feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for kayaking in a rocky river. My feet had become very tender in the last few years so these were indispensable for walking along the rocky shore and getting in and out of the kayak. They are light weight and dry overnight if you take the insoles out or more quickly if you leave them in the sun. Pretty comfortable and easy to get on and off. They gave me additional traction on slippery rocks. A little sand will come through the mesh and small pebbles got stuck in the outside bottom of the sole but it didn't bother me and wasn't hard to get them out. My husband bought a pair too and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethK

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe that breathes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these around the theme parks (Universal and Disney) all the time. They don't even look they have any wear on them. The shoes are amazingly breathable - I can feel the wind going through them just while walking around. I don't wear them with socks and they don't get all stinky like other sock-free shoes. I will probably buy another pair before they go away.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Apple

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes because they have a sturdy sole
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes because they have a sturdy sole. I walk on the beach and with these, I don't get as many shells or sand on my feet as when I use the other fabric water shoes. They take longer to dry out than the fabric kind you can twist dry. They are very wide. I got the style with the laces since other reviewers also indicated they were wide. I thought I could lace them tighter and I can. I have to fold up the extra lace into the loops to keep them from dangling the ground. Overall, they are good for beach walking. I wouldn't wear them anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Voll

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these shoes, I was concerned that it wouldn't provide enough support and I had wasted my money. Now I wish I had brought them on my trip to Japan. Easy to get feet in and out, lightweight and doesn't take a lot of space. Gel feel on soles of feet for comfort. Yet walking on sidewalk, rocks or gravel, it is still comfortable and I don't see any nicks on the bottom. I originally thought they might fall off when I was walking but that has not happened. Looking forward to taking them with me to Hawaiian beaches and hiking. I would get it again if/when it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Laces Are For Decoration Only
customer_reviews.text: The laces are decorative. They do not tie or tighten the shoe in any way. Each piece is glued individually on the underside of the grommet. I must have shoes I can tighten. I plan to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Love These Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to wear in the therapy pool while I'm recovering from back surgeries that had complications. I love these shoes. They keep me balanced while I do my therapy and are so comfortable, they do not slip off in the water and have a good grip on the bottom of the pool. I just throw them in the wash and let them air dry. I have washed them over 15 times so far and they look brand new - they do not fade. I purchased them in the ocean blue color. I will definitely order another pair in a different color. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest5210

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for any outdoor water adventure.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kayaking adventures on the lake. When I enter the lake, there is a lot of rock and sand. These shoes have the perfect grip and the water doesn’t stay in the shoe. I have tried them on my stand up paddle board and am very happy with the grip. These shoes are amazing. I even make stops and my feet don’t feel horrible if I’m out of the water with them for a while. They are true to size and are very comfortable. My friends love them and will be purchasing these soon.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Rosler

customer_reviews.title: True to size. Amazing shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this water shoe. Its is the same as having the feeedom, coolness, and lightness of a flip flop; but offers so much more protection. The arch support is also equivalent to a flip flop, so thats the only draw back. The shoe also appears to look like a real tennis shoe, so its great for my lifeguard job where toe covered shoes are required. Theses shoes are so ventilated you can feel the wind go through them. PERFECT for extremely hot weather. I am thinking of buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Dong

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Purple Water Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that was stiff enough for me to slip my foot into without assistance. Although this is not the case, through sheer determination I have been able to get them on. Thank you for that. And they look wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Purplecat219

customer_reviews.title: Great water sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually super impressed with these sneakers. I was looking for something to wear while kayaking and I have loved them for more than just that. They’re comfortable, lightweight, and dry somewhat quickly. I wouldn’t wear them all day after kayaking, but they dry quick enough. Biggest complaint is the bottoms find small rocks, but they were not super noticeable for the most part. I’d definitely buy these again if my current ones need to be replaced. I’ve worn them as normal sneakers, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. I had no idea water shoes were at this level and have been wearing the same ones from seven years ago. So glad I bought another pair even if I didn’t need a new one. These are so comfortable I’m surprised they’re water shoes. And the padding! Like walking in clouds! The soles are incredibly think and grippy and comfy! What a perfect invention! Got them for an excursion on a cruise but now I think they’ll be my walking shoes for the cruise too!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather I.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase! I bought these on a lighting deal and so far I've used them on a week long backpacking trip (just to cross streams and rivers or to bath, etc.), two fishing trips and to the tidepools. They've served me well! I have a narrow foot so these fit me a little loose in the toe area, but I haven't had any issues with them staying on. They're easy to clean, I just throw them in the washer. They're also light-weight and easy to pack. I hope they last for awhile, but I'll be buying another pair if they don't.
customer_reviews.author: M Camacho

customer_reviews.title: These were amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing shoes!! I have plantars fasciitis so I was a bit nervous to take these for long walks through the jungle/city but turns out, they were incredibly comfortable. Only thing though, don't take these through the jungle with socks when it is cold because you will just never feel dry. Maybe if I were in a drier climate they would have dried overnight, but they didn't in Monteverde, Costa Rica.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable. I have been wearing these around the house ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. I have been wearing these around the house and today is the first day outside. I live in a cold place, so the wind does cut right through! But that is to be expected, I am just wearing them in for a trip I am taking. I will try to update this review after I have worn them for a bit. I got the same pair in men's sizes for my husband who says they feel like he is wearing slippers and has already asked that I purchase him another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Heller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect🙏
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!!! Bought these for a trip to Thailand and also packed a ton of other shoes that I never ended up wearing because these were perfect. We wore these everywhere, walking the city, hiking, swimming, running and they were amazing. My feet never hurt and we didn’t has socks. I was so hesitant on buying these but I was sooo glad I did everyone was so jealous that I could wear them into the ocean and also hike with them as it was so frigging hot but the holes keep your feet cool. So yes but these and they fit as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Avery hicks

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfortable for swimming or walking through the airport!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! I bought them for our trip to Roatan in March. They were so comfy & easy to slip on & off I wore them to the airport to save space in my carry on. They worked so great I wore them on the way home too. They held up great & were comfy even through the hours of standing in the customs line. Not to mention they worked great for long walks on the beach & snorkeling! I also wore them several times at the lake. The white around the bottom is starting to discolor but that's it. I have recommended them to several friends & I will definitely buy them again for my next beach trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off for smaller feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves were nice in appearance and almost looked like regular sneakers. Soles appeared strong and durable. The only issue is the sizing. I'm 6.5 women and when I ordered according to the sizing chart plus the other reviews, my shoe was too big for my feet. Water shoes should feel similar to a wetsuit - like a second skin. These didn't hold well due to the size. Also, the elastics on the top are pre-stitched so there was no way to adjust the fit. Unfortunately, I'm going to send these back and go to a sporting goods store instead to ensure I have the correct fit. :/
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually between a 6-6.5 shoe size and almost always a 6.5 in sneakers. I ordered the 6.5 first which was huge and went down to the 6 and it fit perfect. They do have some stretch so I think they could possibly accommodate a wider foot. I got these for vacations when we do water activities and need water shoes but hate those ugly slip on ones. They easily went from zip lining to tubing in the Caribbean where I don't wanna be barefoot walking in and out of the water. They were comfortable enough to wear with no socks and dry out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, comfy, dries fast, but also a bit wide
customer_reviews.text: The size was true to my usual shoe size and they did work really well for driving, walking, and launching a paddleboard in water and then paddleboarding. They did dry rather fast and were comfy for standing for long hours on my board, I didn't end up with any blisters after 4 hours like with other watershoes. 4/5 stars only because they are kind of wide and can't be tightened since they don't have actual laces, just elastic. For the price they were a good buy and just what I needed for my weekend camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE ORDER A LARGER SIZE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute, but please please listen to the other reviewers and order a half size larger at least. I am a true size 10 shoe and I have narrow feet so I thought that I would be fine with a size 10 since there is not a size 10.5. I was so wrong. The shoe itself is squishy but my toe was so cramped. My toes really hurt after a day of wearing them. So please be sure to get some extra room if you order these.
customer_reviews.author: RStennett

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I normally where a 6.5 but purchased them in 6.5 and they were too big. I purchased in 6 and they got perfectly. Taking them on our trip where there is a lot of rain and we will be at the beach and river to see how they hold up. Will update once returning from our trip. I did wear them for a while around the house and they were comfortable to wear for an hour hopeing for a food experience.
customer_reviews.author: World Travler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these water shoes for a vacation to the ocean. I wanted something that looked more like sneakers and not the average water shoe. If that’s what you’re looking for too then these are for you! I walked around with these on around the beach and people compliment saying that they liked my sneakers. They were very surprised to find out they were water shoes. I was able to throw a bathing suit cover up on and hit the beach bar wearing these shoes! When stepping the water they protect your feet and are very light weight. You and everyone you know needs these!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barbato

customer_reviews.title: Great great water shoe! Lightweight and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: K. I have changed my review... item description changed since I bought them. When I bought them, they were described as a breathable running shoe. But what I recieved was the perfect water shoe! So I was bummed until I found how great they were for water etc. I accidentally dried a shoe and it messed it up bad. I plan on ordering a new pair cause I ended up liking them so much. Ironically, I walked through some wet snow up in glacier, my feet stayed the warmest out of my group cause they did not retain the cold snow melt. Easy to wash. They are really cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Vega

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I don’t like how uncomfortable traditional water socks are. I also love that these look like tennis shoes and are so comfortable! They dry quickly and work exactly as water shoes should. Because they are so comfortable, I’ve worn them most of the summer, whether I’m planning to go near water or not. The only downside I’ve noticed is pebbles can get stuck in the bottom holes, so if you will be walking through pebbles or pea gravel, etc. that might be an issue. Definitely not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abcdefg

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I wanted these for a hiking trip where I would be going near waterfalls and rivers. I haven’t gone yet, so I’ll have to update with how they do in that situation. I was too excited not to wear them though, and they’ve held up with me wearing them to run errands etc. I’ve got a lot of compliments, and people are shocked to find out it’s a water shoe. I bought the peachy/coral color, and I ended up buying a full size smaller. If you have wider feet I would say get your normal size, or just half a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Perfect for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 10 shoe and hate flip flops so this was a perfect alternative to keep my feet from burning in the sand or getting cut in the ocean. I got the shade closest to my skin color so they blended in. I was surprised at how comfortable they were, easy to get on and off, and easy to clean. Loved that they weigh less than a sandal. I also appreciated that I could easily adjust them (I have thin feet) and didn't have to worry about them slipping off. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meeahcagee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but flawed stitching
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes and loved the fit...,, however, after a couple weeks use in aquatics class, the stitching began to unravel on the back left heel. I returned and received another pair of the same shoe. Again, after a couple weeks wear, the stitching began to unravel in the same place on the replacement pair. There seems to be a design flaw or manufacturing flaw . The shoes are light and comfortable but they just don’t hold up. I’m only using 3x a week too, and I don’t wear them outside the pool. More care needs to be given to the stitching of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gallahair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Travel Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've brought them on several trips now around the country. Hiked in Hawaii and used them as water shoes while snorkeling in a rocky area. Also brought them to Moab and did the simple trails with them. The weight is perfect and the bottom is strong enough to support different terrains. I do find small bits of gravel get stuck in the bottom that are a nuisance but not difficult to get out. They are better than the typical water socks in that they look like normal shoes and you can wear them out in public without feeling silly. It's a great price for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sharra

customer_reviews.title: These are SUPER comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the advice of other reviews and bought a half size smaller than I would have normally and it was the right choice. These shoes are SUPER comfy - with or without socks. I am headed to Cambodia for a dental mission in March and needed something that I could wear that would provide some ventilation during our excursions/sightseeing between work days. These will totally fit the bill. They are lightweight, sturdy and flexible, but they stay on your feet nicely, not weird and stretchy like you expect water shoes. I love that I don't have to bother with laces too. I may buy a few more pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Light weight. Comfiest shoes. I paid $19.99 for the all black version. Also got them in blue for a couple bucks more. I wear them for work. Don’t step in a puddle! They’re water shoes and have no barrier you can see through the soles. I love them! Comfortable and don’t look frumpy.
customer_reviews.author: michelle young

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Watershoe
customer_reviews.text: Very fast service, nice looking shoes, very lightweight. I haven't gotten them wet yet, but because of the way they are constructed, it looks like they will dry very quickly. I wore them around w/ bare feet initially, and because of the seams inside, you may want to wear socks, at least until they get worn in a little, but overall very comfy and very nice looking. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Straub

customer_reviews.title: Great travel/holiday shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these water shoes for a trip to Fiji. I wore them with ankle socks on the red-eye flight from LAX and they were super comfortable to sleep in, not feel like “shoes” and emotions keep my feet warm. On the islands these were great for island hopping, getting on and off boats, walking I water and in dry surfaces. I put these through quite the challenge and they stood up and never faultered. Great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hiking through caves in New Zealand. They worked awesome!!! Everyone else was complaining about their wet shoes hours after the hike and mine had already air dried. They have a decent grip on all the wet slipper rocks so I had no issue with footing in the cave. I also wore them for a very muddy hike to a waterfall. They were great for the times where our feet would sink completely in mud and great for climbing the side of the waterfall. My only issue was trying to walk on mud, they had no slip resistance unlike my friends in their hiking hoots. Comfortable and look nice. Overall great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Shalarra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think I like these shoes more that I thought I would. Bought them for a beach vacation and they were super convenient. I wore them around the island and went with them in the ocean. Showering off in the open beach showers was super easy because the drainage holes in the soles allowed the sand to wash out without having to remove them. They were comfy enough to walk for long distances because of the sport like soles, but also lightweight for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle J Pitre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Comfy and stylish. They fit well on my wider toes, and they still look good. The mesh upper can fold down so the shoe is basically as thick as the sole, which will be great when I travel. No strings, just easy but secure elastics, and I love it. Don't know how they'd hold up to running, which is something they say these shoes can do, otherwise they're perfect for water shoes or just everyday comfort walking shoes
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put on and the material is very rough on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: In this case you get what you pay for. They serve the purpose for this summer, I do not expect they will last much longer but I did not want to pay alot for water shoes I will only use a few times. Good enough but I know some people would not wear something so cheap. It's not important to me, after all I wear them in the water so it's just the crabs and fish!!
customer_reviews.author: LabLvr

customer_reviews.title: They're okay.
customer_reviews.text: They're okay. They feel cheap so if you need something really tough these aren't for you. I've just been wearing them in the boat and they've been working just fine. This way I can walk in the water to get the boat on/off the trailer if need be. I don't hate them; I will keep wearing them but I definitely won't be buying another pair once these kick the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: PaTrisha

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a cruise and these water shoes did their job perfectly. They are easy to walk in on concrete or sand and nice to swim in. I walked around the beach, the walkways and the deck of the ship. I didn’t feel weighed down wearing them in the water. I would highly recommend these shoes. *Months later I’m using these to ride my stationary bike. Tennis shoes are clunky and I’m not paying some ridiculous price for special bike shoes! I still love these shoes💜
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but too big when I ordered my size.
customer_reviews.text: I wear in between a 6 1/2 and a 7. Interred a 7 to make sure. It is way too long. And too loose around most of my foot. The elastic on the shoe was lose as well I put in my new elastic as I was worried they would fall off in th water. They are light way abs I don’t think they will be too heavy in the water. One of them is itchy on the top of my foot. I don’t know if there is just a rough patch of fabric or if it’s just a weird stitch in the fabric. Might have to wear a bandaid in the spot cause it’s irritating
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and cute water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Caution: these do run big and we had to return 2-3 times before getting the right size. However, they are amazing! They're perfect for a day of adventuring. I wore them on a 10 hour cenotes tour in Mexico where we ziplined, and cliff jumped and snorkeled and hiked through the woods. They're great and comfortable. I've even worn them to the gym. They have fantastic drainage and ventilation and drain well.
customer_reviews.author: Primeloveit

customer_reviews.title: Takes a really long time to dry
customer_reviews.text: fits and wore it on a cruise, went in and out the water. It was comfortable and wore it all day. It was fine but it took a long time to dry. My husband purchased a different model that also said quick drying and his was dry by the morning while mine were still very wet and cold. I should have purchased the ones my husband did.
customer_reviews.author: Tohya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Protective
customer_reviews.text: Never know what's on the bottom of the waterway that you're entering. Whether it's slick, sharp, rough-edged or variable you'll need something to protect your feet. Even in pools, you just can't be sure about uneven surfaces below. Color was nice and my wife was grateful for the protection when we went swimming in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were better than expected. I bought them to do a lot of walking in Mexico where I expected there to be a lot of water. These shoes stood up to a whole week of excessive walking (10-20 miles a day!) and they were so light and comfortable. The only negative experience I had was the bottoms have holes, to breathe and dry, but where I was walking had lots of small rocks that kept getting stuck. That was my only complaint. I love these shoes, they are so comfortable, durable, and did exactly what we needed. Plus they are cute!!
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you buy shoes that don't have holes in them.
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike I have about the shoes is that it has holes in the bottom of it and I work outside and my feet be soaking wet so I will have to wear them without no socks instead of with socks other than that I like the shoesthe shoes have holes in them I have to wait till I were them on a day that it is not raining cuz if I wear them on a day that is wet my feet will be soaked and wet
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not much support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to slip on around the house and yard. They are very comfortable for me, dry quick when walking around the wet grass and when it’s raining while I’m walking the dog. There’s little arch support which for me is not an issue but may be for others. The thin sole are easily removed for swimming I’m assuming. Have not gone swimming with them yet. I got a pair in pink too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Havasupai Trip
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use them on our trip to Havasupai in October, 2019. They were perfect for crossing all the water areas and going down the ladder to Mooney Falls. I used neoprene socks to keep my feet dry and free of sand/rocks and it did the trick. Some rocks did get stuck in the holes on the bottom but it wasn't a problem, easy to remove. They provided enough grip on slippery areas. They were comfy and dried quickly. Great price and were perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: MommyAz_1

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As the reviews said, great water shoe that you can also use on land. Easy to hose out after a day of kayaking but as others have mentioned, rocks get lodged in the holes in the bottom pretty easily. It didn't bother me or affect the comfort of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RCS

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I purchased these specifically for kayaking because I wanted my feet covered versus using Teva sandals. These shoes are great for any water activities and still comfortable to wear around walking on the beach, washing the car, etc. They fit well, dry quickly and are exactly as they appear and what I expected. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: 4GVN4EVR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This show is really nice. I got them for a trip to Costa Rica but like them enough to wear in replace or normal tennis shoes as well. They fit true to size. The material dries very fast. Small rocks do get stuck in the holes on the bottom but come out easily. The light peachy color matches the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ambair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed these shoes on my last 3 trips to the lake! They feel like regular shoes when dry and don't slip around. My only complaint is that the soles have huge holes so rocks, dirt and pine needles get stuck in them and can be difficult to remove. Given that one issue they're still a good water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D and A Egan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, lasted for 7 pool workouts
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and fit great. I gave them one star because after 7 trips to the pool for exercise, the left shoes on the left side developed a hole. The mesh has a quarter sized hole. I've never had water shoes wear out in 7 wearings!! Most last me a couple of years. What a bummer...
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, never too hot, a joy to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had an athletic shoe that was comfortable in FL. I am selling my house in FL, closing tomorrow, these are more comfortable than my sandal crocs. I intend to buy another one 1/2 size lower for kayaking in Michigan. I love these shoes. My husband wants to see if they have a men's version. He has problems with his feet getting too warm. I can't feel my feet at all, yet I have not had a single blister. I hope your company thrives, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Good water shoes.
customer_reviews.text: shoes are light weight and dry quickly after being used in the pool. I like the color and the fabric. The lining of the shoe does pull up when I remove my foot. I push it back in place but wish this were fixed more firmly to the bottom of the shoe. They are comfortable to wear but do fit more closely than I expected. I take a water aerobics class usually 5 days a week and shoes are essential to keep my feet from getting roughed up in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and very light!
customer_reviews.text: I used the measuring guide that was with this shoe, and ordered accordingly, the shoes fit perfectly. I put in a extra sole so the small rocks won't get through. I used these shoes for walking in everyday activities, and they are comfortable, and very light. I would recommend these to anyone. It was an easy transaction, fast delivery, and packed well. No complaints at all. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ontiveros

customer_reviews.title: Runs a smidge large, otherwise they’re amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5, but ordered the 6 based on other reviews saying they ran a tad big. These fit perfectly! The sole is very flexible and the shoe is comfortable. The insole is removable, but didn’t slide around while wearing them. They do easily fill with sand, but it’s a shoe full of holes so that’s to be expected. I like that they don’t scream “water shoe” either...they look like a regular pair of athletic shoes. If you’re looking for a great water shoe, this is it :)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: These water shoes would be very good for someone with regular feet
customer_reviews.text: These water shoes would be very good for someone with regular feet. Unfortunately my left foot has become deformed, a charcot foot which turns outward. Thus I am unable to get the shoe on my left foot since I cannot loosen the strings. They are permanently in place, and cannot be loosened enough to get on my foot. Also the right shoe is a little small, so I should have ordered a size larger. I need to return the shoes. How do I do that?
customer_reviews.author: okiebird

customer_reviews.title: AAAAMAZING Water Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes worked great! I wore them on a 6 mile hike through a river and they held up fantastically. The water drained out of them nicely and they were comfy to walk in. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for basic water shoes. They are also stylish, which is a plus! They held up way better than I thought they would and I would recommend them to anyone who needs inexpensive water shoes that still work!
customer_reviews.author: svan95

customer_reviews.title: if good I will be ordering another pair
customer_reviews.text: Lord I used these this morning. I got done with a 1 mile pool run 15 minutes early. Then decided 2 stay and do 1/4 of a mile. My back didn't hurt. Heck I might even see how they feel at work on hard floors, if good I will be ordering another pair. Thankful too I ordered a half size smaller they fit perfect. Reg size would have been to big.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: We wore these shoes on a float trip and the worked great. Only complaint from some were that small rocks ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to view the sizing chart in the pictures of this product provided by the seller and measure your feet! We wore these shoes on a float trip and the worked great. Only complaint from some were that small rocks were making their way into the shoes from the bottom holes.
customer_reviews.author: ArtGirl12

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking on slippery deck
customer_reviews.text: I got these original because I used to hit the drain with my foot when doing water aerobics. I wanted a little foot protection. But I realized these are great because I'm not worried about slipping on deck. These are very lightweight, perfect for water aerobics. I don't think I will be using them as walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JSG

customer_reviews.title: Dreamcity Women's Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Dreamcity water shoes were on the "lightening deal" and I could not resist the great buy! The fit is perfect (size 10) and the shoes are very comfortable. I've been wearing them around the house all day. I've purchased water shoes in past and though they worked well for me at the pool, beach; they just did not feel as comfortable as these Dreamcity water shoes. FYI: I went up 1/2 size from 9 1/2 to size 10. Great decision.
customer_reviews.author: gamerlove

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and look nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually like the look of water shoes, but these just look like sneakers. They will be a great as an extra pair for traveling because they are so light and fold flat. I will definitely pack these on my next cruise for shore excursions where walking is required. The only thing I don't like so far is they are too rough on the inside to wear comfortably without socks, so I'm not sure if I'll actually be using them as water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: O Be Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for a Beach Day
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our cruise to Haiti as we were going to be walking around the island and going to beaches. They fit wonderfully (which I always worry about since I have wide feet) and were comfortable to walk in. I also have plantar fasciitis and these were not great in that regard but good purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Fave shoes in history.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! I’ve never been a sneaker person but these I love. I go to the river or outdoors with the pups often and these are my go to. Great for water or even a road trip! Easy off and on. These are even my gym shoes. I will say they maybe stretch a bit once wet and get kinda big. I wear an 8 normally. These are 7.5 but I prob coulda gone to 7. Still great though. Pretty comfy although I could see there being too much fun for a crazy hike or something.
customer_reviews.author: Mossy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Best travel shoes! So lightweight, easy to pack. Looks great with shorts. I wore these all over Thailand and Colombia. Love that I can wear them in water or walk all over a city. Liked that it’s close enough to my skin color to stand out too much. I also bought a pair in black to wear with leggings. I normally wear a size 8 shoe and ordered these in an 8 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. My first pair was purchased to use in a pool at my fitness club. They worked perfectly and didn’t hinder my swimming. They held up well eve through the chlorine. I no longer using the pool , wore them as beach shoes this year and was very pleased. I’m only replacing with a new pair as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey L Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Not the water shoes for me
customer_reviews.text: I love the color purple so it was nice to order these shoes in my favorite color. Unfortunately they are a trifle short and the soles do not feel good on my foot bottom. I can feel every bump and space. I tried walking around the house in them but just the short trip across the kitchen floor was quite uncomfortable. If possible, I'll be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Planter faciitus
customer_reviews.text: I loves these shoes. The best and most comfortable I have worn in 4 years. This is the second pair I bought. I use these for day to day wear. The best and least expensive for my planter faciitus and my feet being prone to over heating and blistering. These breath. When they get wet they dry quickly! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C. Troub

customer_reviews.title: They are water shoes that look like keds!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for the days at the cabin where you are playing around in the water and also walking on paths. They are perfect for that. they honestly look like Keds and no one expects that they are safe for water. The fit is nice. i would say that they are a little wider than Keds but i like that since my food is a little wider. They slip on really nicely and dry off surprisingly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these to Disneyland earlier this month because I got tired of my other shoes getting soaked on water rides and causing blisters when I had to walk 10 miles around the parks and back to the hotel. These shoes were great! I had no blisters at the end of the week. They are very comfortable, in fact I am wearing them now. I'll probably buy another pair in a different color. I highly recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Disneygal

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these. I am typically a 6 1/2 or 7 and these 6 1/2 almost fit but were too big. I was worried when they got wet they would come right off. I knocked off a few stars because they rubbed on my ankles (even with socks) and I figured if I wore them wet they would just rip my feet apart. I considered keeping them as dry shoes but even with the socks they hurt my ankles. Like I said I really wanted to like them. They looked nice and they seemed well built. Very flexible and flattering shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn M Malavite

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a whim, because of the positive reviews. I was just looking for a comfortable shoe to walk around and do random activities. I got my normal size, fit is good. I tested them at a tulip field and then a brewery tour they were super comfortable to wear for several hours. I actually didn’t even wear socks with them today. I will get some additional colors to have handy!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: The left and right shoe are different sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shoes TWO times. The first time the right one was the right size and the left one was at least a size bigger. I sent them back and reordered them. The second time the right shoe was the right size and the left one was about a half a size bigger. I still could not use them that way. I gave up and ordered another pair from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great water shoes. You can't stop from getting sand in them if you are buying these for the beach. It's a bit uncomfortable when you are walking in them and they dry with sand inside. So, take a pair of shoes to change into after your beach time if you are still sight seeing.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Wasko

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in my size and my boyfriends for our cruise, we both loved them! Super comfy, love that there's a little breeze on your feet when you walk, but also does the job of protecting your feet from rocky terrain (and germy bathroom floors/poolsides). Kind of weird to actually swim in, all the ventilation makes them less aerodynamic, but they dry fast so you're not walking around with damp feet all day. I can't wait to try them at the beach next summer!
customer_reviews.author: shackelforrd

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about these since they're water shoes and almost all reviews were by people who used them as such, but I work in a kitchen and needed non-slip shoes. Many are either ugly or expensive, so I couldn't be happier that I found these! They are great. I even wore them to wash a van and they dried within an hour. They're very flexible, light and comfortable. True to size. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Scarlata

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for light hiking. They held up well hiking through mountains in North Carolina and trails in Florida. Shoes dry very quickly and are super light weight but sturdy. They look great. The bottoms of the shoes do have a diamond pattern that make them very flexible and comfortable but small rocks can get stuck (and easily removed). Definitely worth it and great price! These are my favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: lance wurzbacher

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THE STYLE AND THE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE STYLE AND THE COLOR. IT FEELS VERY LIGHT WEIGHT. THE PROBLEM IS THAT I AM 6.5 AND THESE DON'T COME IN HALF SIZES. THE 7 WAS TOO BIG AND VERY LOOSE. IF THEY HAD A LITTLE BIT OF WATER, THEY WOULD HAVE SLIPPED RIGHT OFF. I GOT THE 6 INSTEAD AND THEY FIT SNUGGER BUT THE FRONT OF MY BIG TOES RUB AGAINST THE FRONT OF THESE SHOES--WORRIED THAT WILL RUB A HOLE IN THEM EVENTUALLY. I MIGHT HAVE TO REINFORCE THEM SOMEHOW WITH RUBBER GLUE.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order a size up! They were huge!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that said to order a half size up so I did. They were too big. Sent them back, ordered my regular size, still big. Sent them back, ordered a half size smaller, still too big! Just received a full size smaller than what I usually wear and honestly could probably do a half size smaller again. I have narrow feet so maybe that’s why 🤷🏼‍♀️ Laces are not adjustable so you’re going to want to get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: TheManimal

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I’d expect for the price, but good fit/support
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how these will hold up under normal wear, but I thought I’d give them a try. I like the fact that I can cinch them nicely around my narrow feet. They seem to be cheaply made though, so I’m not happy about the price for the product I received. I decided to keep them anyway because I can cinch them up and because they provide some arch support when so doing. They will fit a normal foot just fine. I purchased the men’s version for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: DrK

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable well built water shoes I’ve ever owned and they look great! They’re also great for just kicking around as they’re more stable than most. Unlike lots of water shoes the insoles are built in so they don’t slip around or come out. They go on just as easy wet or dry and the drainage is great while getting superb support. I can’t wait to be able to get a second color and show them off. I recommend these highly!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Underwood

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a mixture of flat shoes and something
customer_reviews.text: I’m so surprised! It looks like a mixture of flat shoes and something, but way comfortable than flat! Same flat but much relaxing to me. I also work as a dog walker. I needed something! But if I wear a regular running shoes, it gets hotter inside and at the end I suffer from stinky feet 😷 NO MORE STINKY FEET NO MORE SUFFER YESSSSSSSSS! p.s. I have half flat feet. It’s still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Shin

customer_reviews.title: Love, love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these shoes! I bought them because I work in a garden dept, and my feet got wet all the time, but so many people asked about these shoes, if they were comfy, they had no idea they were water shoes, I ended up wearing them all the time everywhere, and several of my coworkers also bought them, in fact I will be getting another pr soon I have worn mine to the ground,
customer_reviews.author: susan d

customer_reviews.title: Get these shoes immediately
customer_reviews.text: Get these shoes immediatelyI saw them advertised on my travel blog. As being so comfortable to walk in so I figured I just probably use them when I was at the beach or something I wear them all the time. They wash easily. I highly recommend them for the price
customer_reviews.author: stargazer11

product_meta.title: Dreamcity Women's Water Shoes Athletic Sport Lightweight Walking Shoes
feature_bullets: Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe
Solyte midsole provides an exceptionally lightweight midsole with excellent bounce-back and durability
Water Grip outsole provides exceptional traction in wet and slippery conditions
ComforDry sockliner provides the optimum cushioning performance that creates a cooler, drier and healthier shoe environment.
Open mesh on the upper and hole on the sole provides for superior breathability and quick drying
